thread.title: Justin Bieber receives support from fans after his hollow-eyed photos spark marital problems rumours with
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber receives support from fans after his hollow-eyed photos spark marital problems rumours with

author: amarylisa-gonsalves
title: Justin Bieber receives support from fans after his hollow-eyed photos spark marital problems rumours with
text:
Table of Contents
Justin Bieber has been making headlines recently for his relationship with his wife Hailey Bieber. While the singer has been off the charts for some time now and has been facing health issues, the internet has theories that his relationship with his wife could be strained. To add to it, his latest appearance in New York City on Wednesday raised more eyebrows as he looked visibly tense and hollow-eyed. His condition further fueled the speculations about potential marital issues with his wife. Notably, this comes after the parents to Jack Blues Bieber were spotted recently during a date night together over the weekend.
However, fans and users on the internet have come out in support of the Baby singer.
Justin Bieber spotted looking hollow-eyed in New York
The Kiss Me singer was spotted in New York sporting wearing his signature dishevelled-chic look, with a bright yellow hoodie, baggy cargo pants, and fuzzy slipper-like shoes. The singer was seen walking through the bustling streets of New York City when his dramatic gesture of grabbing his crotch grabbed eyeballs.
He was also seen wearing a black baseball cap as walked towards his luxury SUV parked around the corner. Meanwhile, Hailey was spotted leaving a building in Union Square all alone.
Their separate appearances come after recent rumours of a tumultuous marriage. It started when Bieber unfollowed his wife on Instagram leading to a sea of speculations. However, he later clarified on his Instagram stories saying, â€œSomeone went on my account and unfollowed my wife. Shit is getting suss out here.â€
Fans support Justin
However, the internet stood in support of the Mistletoe singer noting that he was a father to a newborn baby and that it was natural for him to be sleep-deprived thus causing the hollow eyes.
One user sarcastically noted, â€œMan, have you ever seen a sleep-deprived first-time father? We all look like that.â€ Another user defended him saying, â€œHeâ€™s had lime disease and a new baby leave him alone mxâ€
Other users noted things like, â€œHeâ€™s a new daddy, cut him some slack. Heâ€™s like, â€œI havenâ€™t slept in 4 years,â€ â€œHis baby not even 1 yet. That nigga jus tired asf ðŸ˜­â€. Another fan wrote, â€œThe man told yall he was dealing with an illness if not last year the year before. Let that baby live in peace.â€
Justin Bieber and Hailey Bieber have been married for around six years now. They welcomed their first child in August 2024, a boy who they named Jack Blues Bieber.
